title: Application of nanopore sequencing for accurate identification of bioaerosol-derived bacterial colonies
content:
Environ. Sci.: Atmos., 2024, 4,754-766
DOI: 10.1039/D3EA00175J, Paper

Austin Marshall, Daniel T. Fuller, Paul Dougall, Kavindra Kumaragama, Suresh Dhaniyala, Shantanu Sur
Nanopore sequencing can be advantageous over Sanger method for the identification of bioaerosol-derived bacterial colonies using 16S reads, enabling accurate detection of individual bacterial components with higher taxonomic resolution.
